content: syrup is one of the four main food groups so of course pal the elf needs this sweet buddy sappy the maple syrup is the perfect beginner ish amigurumi companion for pal s holiday adventures **materials** medium weight beginner easy peasy yarn in tan brown yellow red black 2 × 10mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round unless otherwise noted rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch join slip_stitch join chain chain back loop only blo front loop only flo fasten_off invisible fasten_off embroidery
